para.emphasis: Abstraction of an element in a computation graph for which a derivative can be calculated.
Represents a computation graph of expressions, over which algorithmic differentiation may be performed.
Represents the size of each dimension in a tensor.

listitem.para:
typedef Ptr< Chainable< Tensor > > Expr
Defines a convenience type to represent a shared pointer to a Chainable<Tensor> object.
typedef std::pair< Words, Ptr< Hypothesis > > Result

const size_t SHAPE_SIZE
Represents the size of each dimension in a tensor.
